Name: Luminous Glade
Story Background: Luminous Glade is a serene and sacred grove suffused with the pure essence of light, where nature's beauty is enhanced by the radiance of the celestial realm. It is a place of solace and reflection, where the forces of good and righteousness hold sway.
Ability: Luminous Glade enters the battlefield untapped and adds one white mana to your mana pool. You may tap Luminous Glade to prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Appearance Description: Luminous Glade showcases a tranquil, sun-dappled clearing within an ancient forest, suffused with a gentle, golden glow. The land is adorned with delicate, shimmering petals and intricate patterns, exuding a sense of purity and serenity.
